# spade_group (Resource)

Represents a group within Spade

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "spade_group" "my_group" {
  name = "My group"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Group name

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Identifier of the group
